about_the_game:
Its a music bundle with some songs that can be used to develop.

Original music, orchestration and improvisations for "name of the video game"
All the music here exposed is played and composed from and for the game.
Music from the game.

Miguel Sandoval / Tirso Hernández / Federico Jiménez
Mexico City 2018

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.6.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, ATI Radeon™ HD 4850, or Intel® HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or any.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.6.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, ATI Radeon™ HD 4850, or Intel® HD Graphics 4400
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or any.

  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 960 / AMD Radeon™ R9 280 or better
